1223 This is from a website put together by Democracy Funders Network, which is ran by the Pritzker family. 

According to the website, the total "democracy" NGO ecosystem revenue is 33 billion *annually* with more than 200,000 staff. 

22% of that funding comes from government grants. posted 6 days ago by PiratePatriotParrot 54 comments award share report block DataRepublican (small r) @DataRepublican • 7d This is from a website put together by Democracy Funders Network, which is ran by the Pritzker family. According to the website, the total "democracy" NGO ecosystem revenue is 33 billion *annually* with more than 200,000 staff. 22% of that funding comes from government
